name: Andy BSC
description: $ANDY, PEPE's best friend and the yellow mascot of the yellow chain, BSC. The Boy’s Club includes Andy’s friends; Pepe the Frog & Brett, Landwolf & Bird-Dog. Andy is a brightly colored figure who loves hot dogs and his friends. Andy often appears with a cheerful, wide-eyed expression, his personality exuding a mix of playful curiosity and gentle absurdity. In many ways, Andy is a testament to Furie’s broader vision as an artist—one that emphasizes creativity, playfulness, and an appreciation for the strange and beautiful aspects of life. Through Andy, Furie continues to captivate fans of his work, offering a gentle yet profound exploration of imagination and humanity.
